question: Question_01_(e)
statement:
Suppose it is known that the direction of the fastest increase of the
function $\displaystyle f(x,y)$ at the origin is given by the vector
$\displaystyle \langle 1,2 \rangle$. Find a unit vector
$\displaystyle \textbf{u}$ that is tangent to the level curve of
$\displaystyle f(x,y)$ that passes through the origin.
